abstract: The trustee liquidating the Madoff estate releases a document that asserts a big investor, Jeffry M. Picower, had trouble getting his money back from the money manager.
snippet: The trustee liquidating the Madoff estate releases a document that asserts a big investor, Jeffry M. Picower, had trouble getting his money back from the money manager.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:16 p.m. From Diana B. Henriques, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Trustee Cites 2003 Problem in Madoff Account
